---
title: "Integrations Overview"
description: "Data sharing with third-party apps is possible through integrations."
---

Application Integration refers to enabling independently designed applications to work together by seamlessly exchanging data, workflows, and functionalities. This ensures that different software systems, cloud-based, on-premises, or hybrid can communicate and function as a cohesive system.

## All Integrations
